channel.title: Scar Portable Beta [SRL4] Last updated:Sunday, October 28, 2007
channel.description:
[center][size=20pt][font=Verdana]Scar Portable Beta[/font][/size][/center] [center][size=12pt]Run scar from an exe! [b][u]No installation needed[/u][/b]![/size][/center]
[size=8pt][font=Verdana]Current Version:1.0.0.0 Status: Beta, Very Buggy Expect updates if possible[/font][/size] [b]Made portable by Search (me ;D)[/b]
Lastest test: I got scar to rotate, find tree colors, but I forgot to enter what type of tree to cut. After that I got a file access error.
Download:
[DOWN](postponed until further notice) 9.07MB |9292KB
After rar extraction:36.6MB
edit:includes srl4 but not rev -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Readme.txt
{{Scar Divi 3.12}} [Portable]
-Made portable by Search
/----------------------------------------------\ 1.0.0.0 ((((Sunday, October 28, 2007))))
Very buggy, only couple of tests made. If possible, many updates & fixes to come.
\----------------------------------------------/
1. Run exe 2. Open script 3. Start
/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/ Credits
++Freddy - for scar/updates
++Search - making portable
++SRL - without srl scar would not be alive
++Rapidshare - for hosting scardivi3.12-portable
++&For everyone who downloads and helps make this program better.

item.title: Scar Portable Beta [SRL4] Last updated:Sunday, October 28, 2007
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

When kaitnieks was releasing it it came as an executable and a zip file, but no matter how you installed it it was always portable.

Read full topic

item.description:
@imafatmess wrote:

Just because you install it, doesn’t mean to say it isn’t portable… You could install a portable application onto your flash drive… Anyway, theres a portable install option with scar nowadays anyways…

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Search Search
item.description:
@Search wrote:

Yes. Right now I removed the link because I’m not sure if I need freddy’s permission to do this. It is copyrighted, but freeware, and I’m looking into it. Very active thread on srl today, but since I removed the link, I think it was deleted.
